summary:
### July 2025 Summary for buidlguidl/ens-pg

- **Major Features and Improvements:**
  - Implemented legacy withdrawals for ETH grants, allowing users to withdraw active grants through the UI (#144).
  - Enhanced the home page by adding a "Read more" feature for grant descriptions that exceed the display limit (#143).
  - Updated seed data to include new milestones for ETH grants to align with the new schema (#142).
  - Added weekly call information to the FAQ section (#141).

- **Bug Fixes:**
  - Fixed the proposal requested amount to reflect the correct values from milestones, addressing issue #139 (#140).

- **Overall Themes:**
  - Focus on improving user experience with UI enhancements and better information accessibility.
  - Addressing legacy system limitations while integrating new features for ETH grants.

topIssues.title: Admin > Show current stage amount requested

topPRs.title: Add legacy withdrawals for legacy eth grants (no milestones)
Allow to see all grant description on home page
Add new milestones to ETH grants in seed data
Add weekly call information to faq
